mapper.select: SELECT waiting.*, patient.name, patient.identity_number, patient.phone_number, patient.gender, patient.birth, patient.address_id FROM waiting LEFT JOIN patient ON waiting.patient_id = patient.id WHERE waiting.id= #{id}
SELECT waiting.*, patient.name, patient.identity_number, patient.phone_number, patient.gender, patient.birth, patient.address_id FROM waiting LEFT JOIN patient ON waiting.patient_id = patient.id;

mapper.update: UPDATE `waiting` SET patient_id = #{patientId}, dept_id = #{deptId}, symptom = #{symptom}, entry_date = #{entryDate}, reservation_date = #{reservationDate}, state = #{state} WHERE id = #{id}
